title: Activities from Early Spring! Honey Strawberry and Garlic Harvest | American Bresse | Drying Herbs

tasks.task: Check beehives and potentially harvest honey.
subtasks: Examine the condition of the hive.
Determine if frames are fully honey-filled.
Decide whether to replace entire frames or take samples.
Prepare necessary frames (medium and deep) for hive maintenance.
Perform bee handling procedures safely (not documented in transcript but implied).
Extract honey if available.
Select only ripe, red strawberries.
Teach children to pick strawberries properly.
Inspect hands after picking.
Evaluate garlic head size and health.
Decrapicide garlic that is too small or deformed.
Cure garlic and onions by drying in the sun.
Monitor guinea's interest in bunnies.
Ensure proper housing (cages) for guinea’s.
Move chickens to a chicken tractor.
Verify hen to rooster ratio.
Confirm breeding stock sufficiency.
